summary: An artist, a school girl, a maid, a train conductor and a business executive are drawn into a great wheel of misfortune as all their lives are touched by the existence of one very particular summer dress.
cast: Henri Garcin|Ingeborg Elzevier|Khaldoun Elmecky|Margo Dames|Frans Vorstman|Peter Blok|Jacob Derwig|Rudolf Lucieer|Maike Meijer|Carol van Herwijnen|Rijk de Gooyer|Elizabeth Hoytink|Jack Wouterse|Ariane Schluter|Kees Hulst|Loes Luca|Alex van Warmerdam|Pieter Verhoeff|Eric van der Donk|Annet Malherbe|Jack Vecht|Jaap Spijkers|Ricky Koole|Leny Breederveld|Bert Bunschoten|Olga Zuiderhoek|Susan Visser|Kees Prins|Titus Muizelaar|Marcel Roijaards|Ramdew Krishna|Nisha Santoe|Bert Luppes|Harald van der Lubbe|Marc van Warmerdam|Cecile Heuer|Martine Berghuijs|Mimoun Oaïssa|Tjalling Heykoop|Bibi Mijerhof|Wesley Hendriks|Maurice Levano|Johan Simons|Saskia Rinsma|Kees van der Vooren|Cor van Lavieren|Hugo Maerten|Henk de Reus|Everard Zondag|Jacques Commandeur|Arend Jan Heerma van Voss|Walter Crommelin|Peter van Warmerdam|Aat Ceelen|Fred Goessens|Iris Römer|Jara Lucieer|Nicolaas Kam Bulterman|Ton Dekker
title: De jurk
